CustomField.description: This is field is update via trigger AW_trg_RuleAction everytime an action is updated or inserted The purpose of the field is to show ALL actions of a rule in a summary level as follows : Collect all actions assigned to the rule Each rule action will be displayed in separate line in URL format For each action show the first 100 chars by concatenating the fields Type__c&& Related_Object__c && DispalyField__c with a "..." in URL Format The URL would take the user to this Rule Action Display Page for the Rule Action ID If you hover on that you get show the full value of RuleAction__c.DisplayfilterLogic__c present
CustomField.label: Display Actions
